content: a pretty and practical hand towel to dress up your oven door continuously crocheted daisy motifs form a panel that overlays a plain background to make an interest contrast in colour and texture the daisy section is crocheted using breakaway crochet techniques so all the daisies are worked with one length of yarn and they re joined-as-you-go - no sewing or yarn tails this requires 1 x 50gm ball of yarn for the daisy section and 2 balls for the background cotton works best you could even use 1 color for both sections for a tone-on-tone effect video tutorial available here 1 1 https //youtu be/vfktahwqugq
